title: Anderson Airport
description: Flight training at Anderson Airport with two runways and a control tower.  Only 25 minutes from Fishers!  Convenient to all Muncie locations!

title: New Cessna 172
description: Train in a 2022 Cessna 172 with modern avionics and a comfortable interior

title: Earn your Pilot's License
description: Fly for pleasure, business, or a career after earning FAA pilot's certificates
